text: Telugu Cinema (Telugu: తెలుగు సినీపరిశ్రమ), means movies and movie-making in the Telugu language. Another word for Telugu Cinema is Tollywood. This is portmanteau made of the words "Telugu" and "Hollywood". Tollywood movies are produced in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana states in the Republic of India. ==Related pages== * Bollywood ("Indian Hollywood" - Hindi, Urdu and Marathi cinema) * Jollywood (Sanskrit cinema) * Lollywood (Pakistani cinema) * Mollywood (Malayalam cinema) * Hollywood Category:Cinema of India
title: Telugu cinema
